All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
Deprecated. 

public class OASensorEvent
extends java.util.EventObject

Represents a sensor event such as a device orientation change or GPS update

Author:
Leigh Beattie

Constructor Detail

OASensorEvent

public OASensorEvent(java.lang.Object source,
                     float[] orientation,
                     android.location.Location location,
                     int screenOrientation,
                     int eventType)
Deprecated. 
Constructs a sensor event

Parameters:
source -
orientation - An array containing orientation values where orientation[0] is azimuth, orientation[1] is pitch, and orientation[2] is roll
location - A GPS fix of the device's location
screenOrientation - The orientation of the screen
eventType - The type of event
